      • addMappings

        public void addMappings(Mapping mapping)
        Description copied from interface: Platform
        Given the attribute and FieldType allows the platform to replace the storage type with a platform specific one. Substitution occurs both for table generation and entity property conversion.
        Specified by:
        addMappings in interface Platform
        Overrides:
        addMappings in class Generic
        Parameters:
        mapping - mapping containing type information of what is being read or written.

      • supportsIfExists

        public boolean supportsIfExists()
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        supportsIfExists in class Generic
        Returns:
        true if the database supports the 'if exists' syntax in the create table/index, drop DDL statements.
